mdui:UIInfo.mdui:Description: You may use this system to submit research proposals or beamtime applications, and to complete all administrative steps required prior and after your experiment (e.g. online safety training, submission of declaration of substances, registration of participants, travel reimbursement, reports, registration of publications).
